Class converts

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map.converts
  • public class converts
extends java.lang.Object
    this class contains all converts from pixels to Coordinates and vice versa

    Tal and Aric

                                   double h,

        this function convert Pixels to Coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - pixel on X-axis
        y - pixel on Y-axis
        h - the height of the current screen
        w - the width of the current screen
        Returns:
        Point3D after convert to [lat,lon,alt]
